Package persistence.adventure

Interface AdventureDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
APIAdventureDAO, JSONAdventureDAO
public interface AdventureDAO
Interface that provides methods for retrieving and persisting adventure data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Adventure
    getAdventure(int index)
    Retrieves a specific adventure by its index.
    List<String>
    getAvailableAdventuresName()
    Retrieves the names of all available adventures.
    List<Adventure>
    readAll()
    Retrieves all adventures from persistence.
    void
    saveAdventure(Adventure adventure)
    Saves an adventure.

  • Method Details

    • readAll

      List<Adventure> readAll() throws PersistenceException
      Retrieves all adventures from persistence.
      Returns:
      The list of all adventures.
      Throws:
      PersistenceException - If an error occurs during persistence operations.

    • saveAdventure

      void saveAdventure(Adventure adventure) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Saves an adventure.
      Parameters:
      adventure - The adventure to be saved.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs while accessing the file.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • getAvailableAdventuresName

      List<String> getAvailableAdventuresName() throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Retrieves the names of all available adventures.
      Returns:
      The list of available adventure names.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs while accessing the file.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.

    • getAdventure

      Adventure getAdventure(int index) throws FileErrorException, APICannotBeAccessedException
      Retrieves a specific adventure by its index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the adventure.
      Returns:
      The adventure with the specified index.
      Throws:
      FileErrorException - If an error occurs while accessing the file.
      APICannotBeAccessedException - If the API cannot be accessed.
